topics.body:
Well. Looks like the Marvel Universe is getting a reboot after all. Or atleast a merging universes...thing.

!http://whatchareading.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/MarvelSecretWars.jpg!

Ultimate universe and mainstream universe are ending and gonna be smooshed together into one new one.

!http://img.pandawhale.com/post-49639-spongebob-waiting-gif-Imgur-co-tfl3.gif!

I don't know how to feel about this. Is Miles Morales gonna be gone? still there? Is this why Peter is getting remarried? Is Cap gonna be like ultimate Cap now? Is it gonna start from the beginning again? Is it gonna be confusing as shit like DC's Reboot which was supposed to make things easier to understand...but..didn't. At all.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8d5eb636872017c2c2000#post_54e8d5eb636872017c2c2000
I honestly really don't like the premise of Rebooting a series, unless it is truly needed.

Because its like you risk fucking everything up and virtually making some things just not cannon and not existing anymore.

Like look what Disney did to the expanded universe of Star Wars, all of it doesn't exist now and that's _*terrible*_

Binks? ah yeah. Everyone loves him. He's stayin.


It's the Age of -Ultron- reboots, son!
